msbt.message: Welcome back, everyone! I hope you all found just the right spots to set up your new homes. Of course, you can sleep on it for a while, hm? Really get a feel for how it suits you.
And with that taken care of, we can move on to more serious businessLike throwing an island-warming party! We'll have it right here in the plaza with a roaring campfire.
We'll just need a few supplies to get started, yes?
Since we'll all be living here togetherthis will be a good test of our teamwork!
Let's seeTimmy, , Tommy, and can set up things here in the plaza.
Meanwhile, and I will work on gathering firewood and perhaps a little snack!
Alright, everyone. Let's get to it!, would you come see me for a moment?

Ah, . I just wanted to go over what we'll need for the campfire. I think roughly 10 tree branches should do the trick. You can find them scattered about the island. So, when you find one lying on the ground, just press  to pick it up! Meanwhile, I'll investigate the -like items growing in the trees. I suspect they're real !
Not sure what a tree branch looks like? Well, you can't go wrong with anything that MIGHT be one. Just to be on the safe side, I'd collect anything that sets off your inner tree branch detector!

Need a refresher? Just press  to pick up an item from the ground.You might find that you accidentally pluck a weed or two in your quest for firewood. A happy accident, as far as I'm concerned! You're already hard at work beautifying our island.

We're going to need 10 of the fallen tree branches you might have seen lying around.Speaking of which, have you tried shaking any trees yet? You might get branches and other things that way!Just approach any tree without fruit and press  to give it a few good shakes. Easy does it! You're bound to shake something loose eventually.
If you lose track of how many branches you've collected, you can press  to check your pockets!
Ah, welcome back. I trust you had some success foraging for tree branches? Very well! Allow me to lighten your load.

Oh—good, good, ! It looks like you've managed to collect up the tree branches Hm?You found even more than I asked!<10_4 /> I only need the 10, but I'm sure you'll find a good use for the rest. I'll take what we need off your hands now!
Yes, yes, that should be plenty for our campfire. You made quick work of that! I'm quite glad that I'll be sharing this desolate island with such a hard worker, oho!

And speaking of surviving on a desolate island, our next task is to round up something to snack on. While you were collecting branches, I was evaluating the fruit that seems to be abundant here. They look like , they smell like , and they even taste like . In factthey are 100 percent, without-a-doubt, genuine ! So, will you collect 6 of them for me?

Now, I'm sure that you don't need much guidance here, but just in case If you see a tree growing , you can press  to shake it. Then just pick the fruit up! I'm sure you'll have plenty of for us all in no time.

Oh, what's this? You've already collected enough for everyone, haven't you? Well, well! I knew you were the right one for the job. Thank you once again! I'll go ahead and take those off your hands and get started on the preparations!
These local are a real delicacy. How fortunate that they grow in abundance here
Good work so far, but do please harvest a total of 6 so that we'll have enough for everyone.
Need a hint? Well, I'm no farmer, but I believe you can shake them out of a tree by pressing . And you can pick up off the ground by pressing .
Well, well! I knew you were the right one for the job. Thank you once again! I'll go ahead and take those off your hands and get started on the preparations!
Now, is that everything<10_4 /> Yes, yes, I believe it is!Let's get started with the festivities!

At last, allow me to properly welcome you to your new island!I have participated in many ventures and endeavors over the years, but this may be the most exciting. Helping develop a thriving new community entirely from scratch will truly test my business acumen. And perhaps my skills as an outdoorsman, hm? Oho!

Now, we may not have the kind of numbers that I originally envisioned But that just means we'll have to rise to the challenge!And I have no doubt that, with hard work and perseverance, we'll shape this deserted island into—
I suppose we can't call this a deserted island anymore, hm? But what SHOULD we call it

I sense a great opportunity!<10_4 /> As the first residents of this island, we should be the ones to name it. And, in the spirit of democracy, we should put it to a vote. Majority rules, hm? So, take a little time to think, and when everyone is ready, I'll present your ideas.
Alright! Is everyone ready?
Let's try saying our ideas all at the same time!
ReadyGO!
What splendid variety. Yes, yes! Each one a potential gem.
Now for the voting. I'll say each name in order, and you can clap for the one you think is best.
seems to have the enthusiasm and the naming sensibilities. Let's start there
So, suggested
Wow! That's an overwhelmingly positive response! Each and every one of you clapped.
I suppose if everyone is in agreementwe could just go with !
Sounds great!
OK!
It rocks!
Ab-solutely!
Splendid! Then, from now on, this island will be known as .
Out of curiosity, ...is it -shima, -jima, or -tou?
-shima.
-jima.
-tou.
Sounds good! Then, as of today, this island will be known as !

<20_3 arg="6" />Well, Since you've proven yourself by naming I'd like to rely on you for other critical decisions we'll need to make on this island.Yes, yes! I hereby name you the Resident Representative of !
, could you please say a word or two as the new spokesperson for your neighbors?
Howdy!
A word or two!
You can count on me!
Hm, so We've settled on a name for our island, and we've selected our Resident Representative. It's been a big day, but it's gotten rather late, so let's have a toast!
Everyone have a beverage in hand?It's fresh juice made from our new Resident Representative harvested on this very island!
Then, without further ado a toast! To and the happiness of its residents!
Cheers!<10_8 arg="60" />

Maybe I'll go do that.
I'm not tired yet!
Ah, . Having a good time, yes?I know this is all a bit much, so if you feel like turning in, by all means, go ahead. We'll keep the fire burning.
Maybe I'll go do that.
I'm not tired yet!
Sounds good to me! But first, you'll probably want this

It's your very own camping cot! You'll want to set it up in your tent before you lie down. Oh, and there are a few packages waiting in your tent as well, hm? Just a few items that might be useful. To open packages and use the things inside, press .And when you're ready, you can move  to crawl into bed.
We've got another big day ahead of us tomorrow, so rest up as much as you can tonight. Yes, yes, that's all from me for now. Sweet dreams, !
Ah, . Having a good time, yes?I know this is all a bit much, so if you feel like taking a short nap in your tent, by all means, go ahead! We'll keep the fire burning.
Ah, . Having a good time, yes?I know this is all a bit much, so if you feel like turning in, by all means, go ahead. We'll keep the fire burning.

Oh, but, I have something to give you before you go back to your tent.Before you go rest, please make sure you have room to carry something and then speak to me!If your pockets are full, you can drop something around here for now— no one will disturb it, I assure you!
Yes, yes. I should have known you would have plenty of energy. Well, enjoy the moment!
Of course. You work hard and you play hard, hm? By all means, carry on!
Just stop by and see me for a quick chat before you turn in. I have something to give you!
I hope you find the camping supplies in your tent useful. Remember, press  to open the packages!
To use your new supplies or a piece of furniture, stand in front of it and press . Simple, hm?
When everything is set up and you're ready to doze off, move  to hop into your cot.
Excuse me! I highly recommend picking up your tent from either Timmy or Tommy first!
Excuse me! I want to make sure we get off to a great start, so would you mind talking to me first?
Excuse me! Would you mind participating in a short orientation first? It will be quite useful, hm?
Ah, I see you've discovered our island bulletin board. Not much to see quite yet, I'm afraid!
